org.pwr.odwa.server.structure
Class DBField

java.lang.Object
  org.pwr.odwa.server.structure.DBField

public class DBField
extends java.lang.Object

Class represents single field in database table

Constructor Detail

DBField

public DBField(java.lang.String n,
               boolean pK,
               boolean fK,
               java.lang.String fTN,
               java.lang.String fCN,
               java.lang.String dT,
               java.lang.String dV,
               boolean nA)
Creates new DB field with given parameters

Parameters:
n - Field name
pK - True if field is a primary key
fK - True if table is a foreign key
fTN - Name of table to which refers field, should be null if field isn't a foreign key, cannot be null if field is foreign key
fCN - Name of column to which refers field, should be null if field isn't a foreign key, cannot be null if field is foreign key
dT - Type of data in field (see java.sql.Types)
dV - Default value
nA - True if field is nullable
